ComicInfo.Summary:
The Crazy mascot Obnoxio the Clown, along with unlikely allies the X-Men, takes on Eye Scream, who can turn himself into various forms of, well, ice cream.
Professor X is planning a surprise birthday party for Kitty Pryde when Eye-Scream enters the mansion and attempts to destroy the team. Using the aide of Obnoxio the Clown, the X-Men defeat Eye-Scream and go on celebrating Kitty's birthday.
*Notes:* The cover is a homage to the cover of Baffling Mysteries #7. The cover is a homage to the cover of The X-Men #136.
